front.title: A Mechanism for Content Indirection in SIP Messages

abstract.t: This Internet-Draft proposes an extension to the URL MIME External- Body Access-Type as defined in RFC2017 [7] to satisfy the content indirection requirements defined in draft-ietf-sipping-content- indirect-00 [1]. These extensions are aimed at allowing any MIME part in a SIP message to be referred to indirectly via a URL [4].
